update.releaseNotes:
v3.0.3 - Changelog
Adjustments --- - Removed rainbow detection during training analysis. It was too unreliable according to reports - Print error stack traces whenever possible - Adjust logging during training analysis - Increase minimum required match confidence and pixel correlation values during training analysis of stat gains - Add a bonus to priority weight during training analysis for the top 3 prioritized stats to prevent overriding large stat gains over the target stat - Slight speed up of training analysis
Fixed --- - Fix OCR bug where 90 skill points were being read as 920 - Mitigate misc check loops by backing out of a screen when possible
